title: Ranger's Broccoli and Cheese Casserole
directions: Spray a 2 quart casserole dish with nonstick spray. Set a side.
Cook the broccoli according to package directions.
Combined broccoli, eggs substitute, soup and mayonnaise in a large bowl. Stir.
Add cheese, onions and pepper to the broccoli mixture. Stir.
Pour the broccoli cheese mixture into the prepared casserole dish.
Crush and sprinkle crackers or stuffing over the top of the mixture.
Bake at 350° for about 30 minutes or until sauce is hot and bubbly.
ingredients: 30 ounces of packaged frozen chopped broccoli
1 can of reduced fat cream of mushroom soup 10 1/2 ounces
Six reduced fat Ritz crackers crushed or stuffing mix
